turns.user_message: Hey, are there any interesting attractions in towncentre today?

turns.user_message: Great.  What is the phone number?

turns.user_message: No thanks. I do need the phone number and post code.

turns.user_message: No that is all, thank you!
turns.agent_response: You are very welcome. Good day.
